plot outline: Immanuel works for a publishing house that is counting its days. The publishing house is owned by Joseph, whom Immanuel treats like his father. Debts force Joseph to leave behind his business. But Joseph recommends Immanuel to a job interview of an insurance company. Though Immanuel lacks the domain knowledge, through his selling prowess he gets the job. He gets a new boss, Jeevan. Jeevan is ambitious professional. He sets up a professional challenge for Immanuel . Now its Immanuel turn to stick to morality when it comes to business.
title: Immanuel
plot: _Immanuel_ (qv)'s life takes an odd turn when the publishing firm that he works for shuts down. He gets a job in an insurance company but faces severe hardships, which end up changing him as a person.

synopsis: The film follows the character of Immanuel who works in a book publishing firm. When the company is closed down due to unexpected reasons, Immanuel and his family find it difficult to make both ends meet. The hardships and harsh realities he faces forces him to see himself and his life in a new perspective that is often outside his personal comfort zone.
